property.name: browser.fullName
property.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Unknown; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/534.34 (KHTML, like Gecko) PhantomJS/1.9.8 Safari/534.34

testcase.name: scrolls to the bookmarked section (R1.1)
testcase.classname: bower_components.laxar-markdown-display-widget PhantomJS 1.9.8 (Linux).An ax-markdown-display-widget when the site is entered through a bookmark with a parameter which refers to a section

testcase.name: reads the file referenced by the URL via HTTP GET (R1.2)
testcase.classname: bower_components.laxar-markdown-display-widget PhantomJS 1.9.8 (Linux).An ax-markdown-display-widget with a configured URL which refers to a Markdown-formatted text with the url "test_md"

testcase.name: publishes an error message
testcase.classname: bower_components.laxar-markdown-display-widget PhantomJS 1.9.8 (Linux).An ax-markdown-display-widget with a configured URL which refers to a Markdown-formatted text with the url "test_md" if the file is not found

testcase.name: converts the markdown file content to HTML (R1.6)
testcase.classname: bower_components.laxar-markdown-display-widget PhantomJS 1.9.8 (Linux).An ax-markdown-display-widget with a configured URL which refers to a Markdown-formatted text with the url "test_md"

testcase.name: resolves images with relative paths (R1.7)
testcase.classname: bower_components.laxar-markdown-display-widget PhantomJS 1.9.8 (Linux).An ax-markdown-display-widget with a configured URL which refers to a Markdown-formatted text with the url "http://laxarjs_org/A/B/test_md"

testcase.name: resolves hyperlinks with relative paths (R1.8)
testcase.classname: bower_components.laxar-markdown-display-widget PhantomJS 1.9.8 (Linux).An ax-markdown-display-widget with a configured URL which refers to a Markdown-formatted text with the url "http://laxarjs_org/A/B/test_md"

testcase.classname: bower_components.laxar-markdown-display-widget PhantomJS 1.9.8 (Linux).An ax-markdown-display-widget with a configured URL which refers to a Markdown-formatted text with the url "http://laxarjs_org/A/B/test_md"

testcase.name: uses a markdown resource and is listening to didReplace event (R1.3)
testcase.classname: bower_components.laxar-markdown-display-widget PhantomJS 1.9.8 (Linux).An ax-markdown-display-widget with a configured feature 'markdown' and attribute 'resource' when 'attribute' is set to a non-empty string

testcase.name: uses a markdown resource and is listening to didUpdate event (R1.3)
testcase.classname: bower_components.laxar-markdown-display-widget PhantomJS 1.9.8 (Linux).An ax-markdown-display-widget with a configured feature 'markdown' and attribute 'resource' when 'attribute' is set to a non-empty string
